fi.cebylfwk
Interface Updateable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Entity
All Known Implementing Classes:
EntityManager, State
public interface Updateable

Every game component which has logic should implement this. The update() method will be called periodically in games busy loop.

Method Summary
 void update(long deltaTime)
          Updates the game logic.
 

Method Detail

update

void update(long deltaTime)
Updates the game logic.

Parameters:
deltaTime - Frame delta time in nanoseconds. This be used when updating the logic, so it runs same speed on every machine.
